articles.title: AmEx quarterly profit exceeds expectations on cost control - Yahoo Finance

articles.content: (Reuters) American Express (AXP) reported third-quarter profit above Wall Street estimates on Friday, benefiting from disciplined expense management that helped cushion a blow from softer fee growth.… [+1733 chars]
